overview: Best-selling author and communicator, Ken Davis takes us on a laugh-filled tour through the things that make for real joy in our everyday lives. In the middle of some of the best comedy you’ll ever experience, Ken shows us that inside all the craziness of our lives is the real reason for living with joy – because that’s the way God intended it to be!  One of America’s most outstanding speakers, Ken Davis goes far beyond a great comedy-filled speaking style. He’s a real communicator who will touch you and your friends.
title: Ken Davis: A Twisted Mind
